properties.title: Lombachalp Moorlands
properties.abstract: The moors at Lombachalp form part of the Habkern-Sörenberg moorlands, one of the largest continuous moor landscapes in Switzerland.
properties.description:
Over 85 percent of the Bernese Oberland community of Habkern comprises moorland of outstanding beauty and national importance. Lombachalp, one of its natural gems, is particularly popular with tourists.

Mystical moors, scraggy spruces and mountain pines, gently flowing creeks and bizarre fields of karst shape the landscape around Lombachalp. Lombachalp is the goal and starting point for a range of hikes. All sorts of exciting things await discovery along the existing trails. Any questions you may have along the way may well be answered by the excellent observation guide with simple, easily understandable text, images and graphics that provides hikers with exciting stories and educational information. Visitors' physical needs are not forgotten - there are barbecue areas and also the Jägerstübli restaurant.
properties.name: Habkern Tourismus
